caption.p: (A) The Thin layer chromatography (TLC) of purified biosurfactant in comparison with reference rhamnolipid. (B) FTIR spectrum of biosurfactant from P. maritimus SAMP. (C) 1H NMR spectrum of biosurfactant from P. maritimus SAMP. (D) LC-MS spectrum of biosurfactant produced by P. maritimus SAMP.
